snippet: About 500 pilots ended a 58-day strike demanding exclusive rights to fly Boeing 787 Dreamliners out of fears that their career prospects could suffer.
abstract: Group of Air India pilots end a 58-day strike demanding exclusive rights to fly Boeing 787 Dreamliners out of fears that their career prospects could suffer.
lead_paragraph: About 500 pilots ended a 58-day strike demanding exclusive rights to fly Boeing 787 Dreamliners out of fears that their career prospects could suffer.

headline.main: Air India Pilots End Strike Over Plane Assignments
headline.print_headline: Company News: Air India Pilots to Return to Work After Strike
